structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Person condemning land may enter it, when.
law.text: By virtue of the judgment of the court, the party to whom the privilege has been granted shall have the right to ingress and egress upon the premises to erect and repair the pipes necessary to conduct the water.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4362.
